QuestData.Title: Farming Stimulator
QuestData.Description: The plants have gone amok since you defeated their masters! Don't worry though, I've got a plan.$b$bI've been busy fixing up one of the farmhands that didn't go completely haywire. It should have enough juice for one more trip through the fields.$b$bWe've got some serious technology in these harvesters. Their tools should be more than enough to take care of some small plants and even a couple quilboar.$b$bWhat do you say? You up for some farming the Stormsong way? Hop on in and get to work!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Piloted Farmhand to slay $1oa enemies.
QuestData.RewardText: Yeah, that'll show them! Those quilboar will think twice before invading my farm again!
